project.description: armConvertOVAtoVHD_1 this is the first job purpose: prepare ARM OVA to azure (by tag) steps: 1. take OVA from Artifactory by tag 2. deploy in esxi 3. ssh and install the sw package 4. export to a new OVA 5. deploy to Artifactory to tempo folder 6. call the second job that will convert the temp ova to VHD
